Description: Chavdar Tale is a historical lake located in Mahad town of Raigad district of Maharashtra . Satyagraha of the tasty lake here is famous in history. This Satyagraha is also known as Mahadcha Satyagraha . Dr. To make the water of the lake open to all and even the untouchables can use this water . Babasaheb Ambedkar did Satyagraha here. Tourists visit this lake as a reminder of this struggle as well as a 'symbol of equality'. Dr. in this area. A full-length statue of Babasaheb Ambedkar has also been erected.

The Rajmata Jijau Masaheb Samadhi is a revered memorial dedicated to Rajmata Jijabai, the mother of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, located in Pachad near Raigad Fort, Maharashtra. Jijabai, fondly known as Jijau, was instrumental in shaping Shivaji Maharajâ€™s vision and values, playing a significant role in the foundation of the Maratha Empire. The samadhi marks the place where she was laid to rest and is a site of deep historical and cultural significance, honoring her contributions and sacrifices. Surrounded by the scenic beauty of the Sahyadri mountains, the site attracts numerous visitors, including historians, devotees, and admirers of Maratha heritage, who come to pay homage to this inspiring matriarch.

The Sav Hot Water Spring, located near Mahad in Maharashtra, is a natural geothermal spring known for its warm, mineral-rich waters. Nestled in a scenic area surrounded by greenery, the spring is believed to have healing properties and is popular among locals and visitors seeking natural relaxation and wellness benefits. The water temperature is warm and soothing, making it a pleasant spot to visit, especially during cooler weather. Sav Hot Water Spring is also considered spiritually significant by some, adding to its appeal as both a natural and cultural attraction in the region.
